ratings.comment: John is awesome!  But, he is a really hard grader.  If you are having problems go see him right away.  He will basically outline the paper.  He even will proofread drafts for you.  John is hilarious and kinda dorky.  But still, coming to philosophy is fun just because I get to look at him! :)

Very engaging and knowledgeable about the subject. As long as you can memorize arguments (that he gives you) you should be fine. Go to the review sessions, he practically gives you the answers. Great guy!

John is a great TA.  He is very knowledgeable and passionate about Philosophy, and the discussions are very interesting and stimulating.  He is very open to questions, and does everything in his power to ensure that you understand the material.  He is a tough grader, but he tells you what he wants before each test so it is possible to get an A.

He's a good professor but an extremely hard grader.  If you are taking this class as an elective and are not a philosophical/ abstract thinker, rethink taking this course.  It has the potential to destroy your GPA

He was extremely helpful in disussion and even more helpful when going to his office hours. For any paper, he would outline what you should write if you go to see him. Also, is interesting and tells jokes before each class.
